# a = bottle 1, b = bottle 2
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

if b + c > a and a != b:
    print(b + c - a)
else:
    print(0)
import sys



def main():
    a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
    print(c - (a - b))


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

sys.stdout.write(str(c - (a - b)))

a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

print(c - (a - b) if (a - b) < c else 0)

# a = bottle 1, b = bottle 2
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

if a - b > c:
    print(c - (a - b))
